org.corfudb.runtime.object

Class VersionLockedObject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.object.VersionLockedObject<T>

  • public class VersionLockedObject<T>
extends Object
    A version locked object. The version locked object contains a the state of an object as well as a history of modifications to the object, which can be optimistic.

    Created by mwei on 11/13/16.

    • Constructor Summary

        Commits all optimistic changes as a new version.

      • optimisticRollbackUnsafe

        public void optimisticRollbackUnsafe()
        Rollback any optimistic changes, if possible. Unsafe, requires that the caller has acquired a write lock.

      • applyUpdateUnsafe

        public Object applyUpdateUnsafe(SMREntry entry,
                                boolean isOptimistic)
        Apply an SMR update to the object, possibly optimistically, if set.
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry to apply.
        isOptimistic - Whether the update is optimistic or not.
        Returns:
        The upcall result, if available.

      • writeReturnVoid

        public void writeReturnVoid(BiConsumer<Long,T> writeFunction)
        Execute the given function under a write lock, not returning anything.
        Parameters:
        writeFunction - The function to execute under the write lock.

      • write

        public <R> R write(BiFunction<Long,T,R> writeFunction)
        Execute the given function under a write lock.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The type of the return value of the write function.
        Parameters:
        writeFunction - The function to execute under a write lock.
        Returns:
        The return value of the write function.

      • isWriteLocked

        public boolean isWriteLocked()
        Return whether or not the object is locked for write.
        Returns:
        True, if the object is locked for write.
